gw.plugin.payment

Interface ISuspensePayment

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface ISuspensePayment
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    Plugin for suspense payments.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply(SuspensePayment suspensePayment)
      Attempts to apply the suspense payment to an existing Account, PolicyPeriod, or Producer.
      Account findAccountToApply(java.lang.String accountNumber)
      Queries for an account by the given account number string.
      PolicyPeriod findPolicyPeriodToApply(java.lang.String policyNumber)
      Queries for a PolicyPeriod by the given policy number string.
      Producer findProducerToApply(java.lang.String producerName)
      Queries for a producer by the given name string.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        void apply(SuspensePayment suspensePayment)
        Attempts to apply the suspense payment to an existing Account, PolicyPeriod, or Producer. Called on each SuspensePayment picked up by the SuspensePaymentWorkQueue
        Parameters:
        suspensePayment - The suspense payment to apply

      • findAccountToApply

        Account findAccountToApply(java.lang.String accountNumber)
        Queries for an account by the given account number string. Used by the suspense payment screens and batch process for validation. Returns null if not found.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - Account to query for
        Returns:
        The Account or null if not found

      • findPolicyPeriodToApply

        PolicyPeriod findPolicyPeriodToApply(java.lang.String policyNumber)
        Queries for a PolicyPeriod by the given policy number string. Used by the suspense payment screens and batch process for validation. Returns null if not found.
        Parameters:
        policyNumber - Policy to query for
        Returns:
        The PolicyPeriod or null if not found

      • findProducerToApply

        Producer findProducerToApply(java.lang.String producerName)
        Queries for a producer by the given name string. Used by the suspense payment screens and batch process for validation. Returns null if not found.
        Parameters:
        producerName - Producer to query for
        Returns:
        The Producer or null if not found
